content.text:
Let me analyze the structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure appears to be a decorative building/castle-like arrangement
- It has multiple layers with different colored blocks
- Base layer: Red arched blocks
- Middle layer: Blue and red cubic blocks with yellow cylindrical blocks
- Top layer: Yellow rectangular blocks, green rectangular blocks, and orange triangular roof pieces

Block count by layer:
Bottom layer: 2 red arch blocks
Middle layer: 2 cubic blocks (1 blue, 1 red), 2 yellow cylindrical blocks
Top layer: 2 yellow tall blocks, 2 green tall blocks, 2 orange triangular roofs

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (red arch block)
    Step2: Move block with index 2 (red arch block)
    Step3: Move block with index 5 (blue cube)
    Step4: Move block with index 7 (red cube)
    Step5: Move block with index 14 (yellow cylindrical block)
    Step6: Move block with index 14 (yellow cylindrical block)
    Step7: Move block with index 12 (yellow tall block)
    Step8: Move block with index 12 (yellow tall block)
    Step9: Move block with index 8 (green tall block)
    Step10: Move block with index 8 (green tall block)
    Step11: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular roof)
    Step12: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular roof)
}

This assembly sequence starts from the bottom up, ensuring stability as the structure is built. Each piece is selected to match the exact orientation shown in both the target image and the block dictionary.
